name: Ryomou Shimei (Ikkitousen)
description:
V2 Description

This is a pretty fast made upgrade. I can tell some poses are not very resposive so it's not perfect, but quality-wise it's an upgrade from previous version. My other Ikkitousen models were better made compared to this one since it's older, so I wanted to bump it up a bit :)

Prompts are very similiar:

Made outfit - ryomou shimei, maid, medical eyepatch, maid headdress, collar, red bowtie, blue dress, maid apron, blue gloves, white thighhighs, boots

School uniform - ryomou shimei, medical eyepatch, school uniform, sweater vest, white shirt, red bowtie, short sleeves, blue gloves, plaid skirt, blue socks, loafers

I took a different approach to torn clothes here because I don't think using made torn related tags work so well. So instead, now it's better to just add torn clothes and then add tags to point to things you expect to see, which could for example be underboob, nipples, navel, white panties etc.

V1 Description

Lora for Ryomou Shimei from Ikkitousen. Seems to work best between 0.8-0.9 weight for me.

The ecchi series of my youth :') Seems like there must have been some mobile game going on or something because there's bazilion outfits for the girls from it. I just sticked to the original ones that I remembered.

Main tags to use always - ryomou shimei, medical eyepatch.

Maid outfit - maid, blue gloves, maid headdress, white thighhighs, white apron, red bow, blue dress, boots, collar. You can also change blue colors to black since images used were about half blue, half black.

School uniform - school uniform, plaid skirt, sweater vest, blue gloves, red bow, white shirt, blue socks, shoes.

Typical Ikkitousen ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) - torn clothes, torn skirt, torn shirt, torn thighhighs. Better put more weight on those.
